introduction.part1: This Privacy Policy outlines the principles of processing personal data collected via the contact form, the offer inquiry form, and through cookies on the DEVNOW website.
introduction.part2: We care about the privacy of users and the security of their data; therefore, we strive to ensure that your data is processed in accordance with applicable legal regulations, in particular, in accordance with the Regulation of the European Parliament and of the Council (EU) 2016/679 (GDPR).

dataController.title: 1. Data Controller
dataController.content: The data controller of your personal data is DEVNOW, based in Gdańsk at ul. Marsa 24B/13, 80-299, registered under the number NIP 5811928738. For matters related to the processing of personal data, you can contact us via email at: kontakt@devnow.net.

recaptcha.title: 2.5. reCAPTCHA
recaptcha.content: The website uses reCAPTCHA, a tool from Google that is used to protect forms against unauthorized access and detect bots. Use of reCAPTCHA is subject to the Google Privacy Policy and Terms of Service. Data collected by reCAPTCHA may include information about user activity on the Site and technical data such as IP address and interactions with form elements.

googleAnalytics.title: 2.6. Google Analytics
googleAnalytics.content: The Website uses Google Analytics, an analytical tool provided by Google, which collects statistical data about traffic on the Website. Data collected by Google Analytics includes, among others: IP address, browser type, geographic location, time on the page and clicks on the Site. This information helps us better understand user behavior and improve the functionality and content of the Site.

processingPurposes.title: 3. Purposes of Data Processing
processingPurposes.content: Personal data collected through forms, cookies and analytical tools are processed for the following purposes:
items: Responding to inquiries sent via the contact form
Preparing and sending a commercial offer
Maintaining the proper operation of the website
Analysis of website traffic using Google Analytics
Protect against spam and bots with reCAPTCHA

legalBasis.title: 4. Legal Basis for Data Processing
legalBasis.content: The processing of personal data is based on:
items: Article 6(1)(a) of the GDPR – the consent of the data subject (in the case of contact through the contact form or offer inquiry)
Article 6(1)(b) of the GDPR – the necessity of processing data for the performance of a contract or pre-contractual activities (in the case of the offer inquiry form)
Article 6(1)(f) of the GDPR – legitimate interest of the data controller (to ensure the operation of the website)

dataRetention.title: 5. Data Retention Period
dataRetention.content: Data from the contact form and offer inquiry are retained for the time necessary to fulfill the purpose for which they were collected or until consent is withdrawn. Data from cookies are stored for the time specified in the browser settings. The user can change cookie settings in the browser at any time or completely disable them. However, disabling cookies may affect the functionality of our website.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.content: In connection with the processing of personal data, you have the following rights:
items: The right to access your personal data
The right to rectify your data
The right to erase data (‘the right to be forgotten’)
The right to restrict the processing of data
The right to object to the processing of data
The right to withdraw consent for data processing at any time
rights.contact: To exercise the above rights, please contact us via email at: kontakt@devnow.net.

dataRecipients.title: 7. Data Recipients
dataRecipients.content: Your data may be shared with entities processing it on our behalf, such as IT service providers, but only to the extent necessary to provide services. All such entities are obliged to maintain confidentiality and ensure adequate data protection measures.

policyChanges.title: 8. Changes to the Privacy Policy
policyChanges.content: We reserve the right to make changes to this Privacy Policy. Current information will always be available on this page.

contact.title: 9. Contact
contact.content: If you have any questions regarding the processing of personal data, please contact us via email at: kontakt@devnow.net.
